health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Fahad Kassim, Hon. Mwaka Bakari, Hon. Moses Aran Oindo, Hon. Kitula, Hon. Tobias Samba, Hon. Fahad Abdallah, Hon. Nzai, Hon. Kibwana Swaleh, Hon. Shebe Salim
health_data_challenges: Poor maintenance causing clogging and overflowing of drainage sewers leading to environmental crisis and communicable diseases
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Ban hawking and selling of food, ban hawking of bottled water, ban food outsourced from unlicensed suppliers, register and license hotel workers and vendors, test and treat water sources, distribute water treatment chemicals, appoint multi-sectoral task force, set up Cholera Treatment Centers
health_evidence_base: Cases of cholera outbreak and measures taken by the Department of Health
